Culture Lab

A ten day residency in Ipswich library with all sorts of different people and some arts stuff.

Marcia Schofield

An artist biog, maybe with some artist history and background. What have they done in the past and what are they doing for this week in the Culture Lab. What is our word limit, bearing in mind the image sizes.

Marcia Schofield website →
